items.title: Former Cigna insurance executive says he quit after witnessing an industry that ‘puts profits over patients’
items.description: The former VP for corporate communications at Cigna writes about the ‘crisis of conscience’ he had while working for the healthcare company.

items.title: Fraud case tied to $100 million NJ deli ends in guilty pleas
items.description: “Your Hometown Deli” became infamous when it was highlighted on Wall Street as an example of irrational exuberance in the market.

items.title: Grindr to give staff $300,000 for fertility treatments, adoption
items.description: The benefit will be available starting next year to those who have been at the company at least 18 months.

items.title: Tesla issues massive recall spanning Cybertruck, Model 3, and Model Y over increased crash risks
items.description: Tesla is recalling almost 700,000 vehicles because of an issue with the warning light on the tire pressure monitoring system.

items.title: JPMorgan Chase, Bank of America, and Wells Fargo sued over Zelle scams that cost $870 million
items.description: The controversial regulator alleges the banks failed to prevent fraud on Zelle, a payment platform they co-own.
